summary: As the demand for mental health care grows, the Veterans Community Care Program allows eligible veterans to receive care through networks of providers in the community when they can't access timely care at VA facilities. VA aims to limit how long veterans should have to travel to, or wait for, an appointment. It collects data on VA facilities' timeliness in scheduling appointments with community providers...
title: Veterans Health Care: Opportunities Exist to Improve Assessment of Network Adequacy for Mental Health
